700017f-a.text:
Third Ave., east side, north from (No. 3524) but not including East 168th to 169th Streets. Also shown is part of the Third Ave. Elevated
Line.
May 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

700018f-b.text:
(1)
3548-3560 Third Ave., east side, between East 168th and 169th Streets. Building shown is the havid Mayer Brewery.
May 24, 1936.
P. Le Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a further view northward.
May 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, as No. 1, and showing a further view southward.
May 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

700019f-a.text:
3560 Third Ave., east side, between East 168th and 169th Streets, showing the south wall of the 2 and 1-story brick buildings of the old David Mayer Brewery as seen from the brewery courtyard. On the left
appears a portion of the Third Ave. Elevated Line.
May 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
